meanings.sent1: The road was very long, stretching far into the horizon.

meanings.sent1: The movie was so long that I fell asleep halfway through.
meanings.sent2: Their long friendship had lasted since they were in kindergarten.

meanings.definition: To have a strong desire or craving.
meanings.sent1: She longed for the taste of her grandmother's homemade apple pie.
meanings.sent2: He longs to travel the world and see new places.
meanings.sent3: The cat longed for the freedom of the outdoors as it stared out the window.
meanings.sent4: The old man longed for the days when he could run and play with his grandchildren.
meanings.sent5: The soldier longed for the peace and quiet of his hometown after years of war.
